March 11, 1990 D Yorkshire Area (Championship Section)
Yorkshire Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire Area yorkshire-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)
Yorkshire
Championship
Test Piece Contest
The Beacons
St. George's Hall, Bradford, West Yorkshire, England, UK Brighouse originally placed 5th but then disqualified for using four ineligible players. Appealed the decision but appeal rejected by National Contesting Council and Brighouse placed last in grading table(British Bandsman 2/06/1990)
March 21, 2010, 3:17 p.m. Oct. 23, 2016, 3:29 p.m.
